data.prayer: Lord, there are 3,200 people in the state of Saint Andrew who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Andrew, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 6,700 souls living in the state of Saint Andrew with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Saint Andrew do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,749 believers in Saint Andrew to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,951 lost friends and neighbors.
Spirit, sanctify the 2,749 believers in Saint Andrew and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Saint Andrew.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Saint Andrew hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.focus_label: Saint Andrew, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

location.name: Saint Andrew
location.full_name: Saint Andrew, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
